Spectrum Class
=================

This module contains the Spectrum class, which is used to represent the 
spectroscopic data. The Spectrum class contains several methods for plotting and manipulating spectra.
The plotting is based on altair <https://altair-viz.github.io/>, a declarative statistical visualization library for Python.
